SLOT.NAME: onInstantiate
SLOT.VALUE: s.actionvalue = s.speech2.recognized_text ; s.speech1.isCommand = "true"; s.speech2.isCommand = "true"; createBasicAction(s.action, s.actionvalue); //canDie(s.speech1.Name); canDie(s.speech2.Name); canDie(s.Name);

SLOT.NAME: onInstantiate
SLOT.VALUE: s.actionvalue = s.speech2.text ; s.speech1.isCommand = "true"; s.speech2.isCommand = "true" ; createBasicAction(s.action, s.actionvalue); canDie(s.speech1.Name) ;canDie(s.speech2.Name); canDie(s.Name)

SLOT.NAME: onInstantiate
SLOT.VALUE: s.actionvalue = s.speech2.text ; s.speech1.isCommand = "true"; s.speech2.isCommand = "true"; createBasicAction(s.action, s.actioncontents); ; canDie(s.speech1.Name) ; canDie(s.speech2.Name); canDie(s.Name)

SLOT.NAME: onInstantiate
SLOT.VALUE: s.actioncontents = "PutDown"+s.speech2.text; createBasicAction(s.action, s.actioncontents) ; canDie(s.speech1.Name) ; canDie(s.speech2.Name); canDie(s.Name)

SLOT.NAME: onInstantiate
SLOT.VALUE: s.actioncontents = "goZeroPosition"; createBasicAction(s.action, s.actioncontents); canDie(s.speech1.Name) ; canDie(s.speech2.Name); canDie(s.Name)

SLOT.NAME: onInstantiate
SLOT.VALUE: myprint("Instantiate "+s.Name+": send text to MouthServer agent: "+ s.value +"...\n"); // mouthserver.execute("sayText",s.value);

SLOT.NAME: onUpdate
SLOT.VALUE: myprint("Update "+s.Name+": send text to MouthServer agent: "+ s.value +"...\n"); // mouthserver.execute("sayText",s.value);

SLOT.NAME: onInstantiate
SLOT.VALUE: myprint("Send command to RoboNeck agent: moveRel("+s.value+", 1) ... \n"); canDie(s.Name)

SLOT.NAME: onInstantiate
SLOT.VALUE: myprint("Send command to RoboPose agent: raise "+s.value +"\n"); canDie(s.Name)

SLOT.NAME: onInstantiate
SLOT.VALUE: myprint("Send command to RoboWheel agent: move"+s.value+"\n");canDie(s.Name)

SLOT.NAME: onInstantiate
SLOT.VALUE: // retrieve the information and speak it out

SLOT.NAME: onEvaluate
SLOT.VALUE: // if time matches then mouthserver.execute("sayText", s.text)
